privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: Respiro respects user privacy and is committed to protecting their information. The application uses the user's location to provide information about air quality in their area.

data_collected.title: Data Collected
data_collected.content: The application does not collect or store personal data or identifiable user information. The user's location is used strictly to access pollution data available through the OpenAQ API service.

data_sharing.title: Data Sharing
data_sharing.content: Location is sent to the Aqicn API (aqicn.org and waqi.info) exclusively to obtain air quality data. No other personal information is shared with third parties.

consent.title: Consent
consent.content: Location usage requires explicit user permission. This can be granted or denied when launching the application.

transparency.title: Transparent Usage
transparency.content: Location data is used only to improve application functionality and provide accurate air quality information. The application does not use location for marketing or analysis purposes.

contact.content: If you have questions or concerns about data privacy, you can contact us at respirofreshair@gmail.com
